content:
Hey @Martin Bellehumeur, I am trying to get your JS sandbox working and I am able to get it to successfully send a subscription to my hub, but I am having trouble with the verification callback. I am using the url below and even I try from Fiddler I get 502 errors. Any ideas?

https://fhircast.azurewebsites.net/client?hub.mode=subscribe&hub.topic=session-id-7a7tng87dfi&hub.events=open-patient-chart&hub.challenge=secretChallenge&hub.lease_seconds=10
Sorry I missed your post. Please use "hub-fhircast" instead of "fhircast" in the future as I use fhircast for protoyping. That check is currently working for me and returns the secret.
